name: Active Radio
description:
This game, this game caused me a lot of trouble.

The game is huge for GDevelop to load so please wait a while before quitting, please, go try other games or something, thanks

I had a lot of fun developing it, hard time uploading it but thanks to Liam, I've got it up and working, thanks a lot, go check him out (https://liam-x220.itch.io/)

Who did what :

Kenny art asset used for the player (intentionally used as a placeholder art but got too lazy to replace), Abstraction - Three Red Heart, Puzzle pieces, used for the main menu's music, hellomynameisjoe made two tracks (one is unused) for the game and they are wonderful!

And of course me, L3mmy, who made all the code, the art, the chatting, and everything else.

If you're looking for a good game, I recommend ilPriiny's game (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-76-radiation/rate/966409) While I was making my game, due to being solo, I chatted a lot with Prinny, that helped with being motivated and self-confidence A LOT

And ofc thank you for reading this really really long description (I had a lot to say) and for hopefully trying my game! Have a good rating time! -L3mmy, the artist and programmer
